name: Flee (thadiusII)
description:
Having not heard from your neighbors in quite some time, you decide to investigate. Upon your arrival, you find yourself trapped on  the premises. 

Find items, solve puzzles, and evade a ghost, all while finding your way out.

I made this in about a week as a way to learn and get used to working with 3D. It's definitely rough around the edges, but I may update it in the future.
